testcase.classname: Test adding and editing employee fuctionality in User management
testcase.name: Verify adding employee fuctionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on homepage...............................................passed And clicks on "PIM" in sidepanel............................................passed Then PIM page is displayed..................................................passed When Admin clicks on Add button.............................................passed Then "Add Employee" page is displayed.......................................passed And Add profile picture.....................................................passed And Fills all the parameters Surajboi,S and Naik............................passed And Click on save button....................................................passed Then "Personal Details" page gets displayed.................................passed And Click on "Job"..........................................................passed And Job details page is displayed...........................................passed Then Fill the parameters for Chief Technical Officer, Engineering and Full-Time Permanent.passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed And Click on the "Report-to"................................................passed Then The "Report to" page is displayed......................................passed And Click on add button.....................................................passed And Add Dominic Chase and Direct...........................................passed When Clicks on the save button..............................................passed And Click on Employee list..................................................passed And Check if the employee with Surajboi S,Naikand Chief Technical Officer is added.passed
